content: a yarn of serendipity pam knighton-haener lauren rose square regardless of skill level please read through entire pattern before beginning lauren rose is the first square in a series of squares designed as a legacy for my grandchildren lauren rose is active inquisitive and so darn smart i made her a blanket using nine squares joined and designed a border that came from my heart this pattern is for the square only hook/finished size 4 5 mm 11 x 11 crochet terms us terminology throughout skill level intermediate yarns and colors used i love this cotton worsted weight 100% cotton ▪ mini and large square - a = rosebud b = antique cream c = rosy ii d = black e = olive f = ivory g = warm blush ▪ blanket in picture - c = rosy ii f = ivory g = warm blush additional items needed stitch markers and darning needle optional colorways ▪ square #1- deep teal a turquoise b aqua c ivory d ~ square #2 - banana a turquoise b aqua c ivory d round 1 deep teal/banana a round 6 aqua c round 11 turquoise b round 2 turquoise b round 7 ivory d round 12 turquoise b round 3 aqua c round 8 deep teal/banana a round 13 aqua c round 4 ivory d round 9 aqua c round 14 turquoise b round 5 turquoise b round 10 turquoise b round 15 aqua c lauren rose square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 1 of 13 stitches used double magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet bptr2tog back post treble_crochet 2 round round half_double_crochet half_double_crochet together chain chain double_crochet double_crochet popcorn popcorn st s stitch/stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet shell space/sps space/spaces bpsc back post single_crochet shallow st shallow stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch fpsc2tog front post single_crochet 2 together 3lp 3rd loop of stitch standing st standing stitch fpdc front post double_crochet invisible join tr2tog treble_crochet 2 together insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post double magic_ring so post is in front of hook yo and pull up a loop video at a yarn of serendipity leaving 2 loops on hook insert hook from front-to- slip_stitch back-to-front around post of next st so post is in insert hook into designated st front of hook yo pull yarn through both loops on hook yo pull through remaining 3 loops on hook video at cynthia at moon loops 1-58 seconds of video standing stitch start with a slip knot on hook fpdc insert hook into designated st or chain space and finish st as yo insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around normal post so post is in front of hook yo pull up a loop video at a yarn of serendipity yo pull through 2 loops on hook yo pull through final 2 loops on hook invisible join do not join after completing last st of round cut yarn tr2tog and pull yarn through st yo 2 times insert hook in first st yo pull up a loop insert hook from
